description: f(x) = Sum a(n)*x^n, n = 1..inf satisfies f(f(x)) = x*(1 + 4*x).
formula: a(n)=4^(n-1) * A097088(n) / 2^A097089(n).T(n,m) = if n=m then 1 else (binomial(m,n-m)*4^(n-m)-sum(i=m+1..n-1, T(n,i)*T(i,m)))/2. a(n) = T(n,1). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 08 2011
author: _Jonathan Deane_
extensions: Added a(0)=0 (sum in title starts at a(1)), _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 20 2011
